author: Joanne Rosa
title: NYC surgeon responds to Trump suggesting supplies being stolen from city hospitals
description: Dr. Craig Spencer, the surgeon who battled the Ebola virus joined "The View" on Thursday, April 2 to discuss the coronavirus pandemic.
content: A surgeon who was the first person in New York City to be diagnosed with the Ebola virus in 2014 rejected President Donald Trump's claim that masks and other protective equipment intended for use in New York hospitals to fight the novel coronavirus, COVID-19,… [+4119 chars]
